about_the_game:
DriftShooter is an arcade shooting Rogue game. The protagonist is a minimalist pixel graphic with a car control feel. You can't control it to stop. You can only operate the left and right buttons to manage your steering and speed. The game operation is very simple. You need to press the left and right buttons, and you must concentrate on avoiding the enemy's pursuit and barrage attacks.
In the game, you will encounter a series of enemies. Each enemy has a different color mark. Enemies of different colors have different attack methods. You need to master the attributes of each enemy to make it easier to pass the level.
There will be some weapon props in the shop. Collect them to get more powerful weapons and equipment. Each prop has a "drift skill". Only by mastering the drift action can you use this super skill. Some skills will have linkage effects, which is very interesting.
Gameplay Controller
Press the left and right buttons to control the direction. Press the direction buttons to use the "drift skill" when moving at high speed, and the car will slow down to a stop.
The car will automatically shoot at nearby enemies. Control the distance to avoid hitting enemies.
Weapon type
50+ weapon types+Drift skills (currently)
30+ passive props (currently)
